Title: Njan Steve Lopez
Writer: Santosh Aechikkanam (screenplay), Santosh Aechikkanam, Ajithkumar (screenplay), Geethu Mohandas (screenplay), Geethu Mohandas, Rajeev Ravi (screenplay), Rajeev Ravi (story), Rajesh Ravi (screenplay), Rajesh Ravi
Actors: Farhaan Faasil, Ahaana Krishna, Alencier Ley Lopez, Anil Nedumangad
Plot: A college student witnesses a gang attack and as his curiosity behind the encounter tries to get the better of him, he realizes that his dad and the police are involved.
